title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series
notes: Poor performance on highest settings, fixed by using low settings. Menu freezes when switching to fullscreen from window mode. Fixed by left clicking with mouse. Bad stuttering when a scene starts but gets better over time. Non game-breaking graphical artifacting https://imgur.com/a/OdZ09t4

Significant stuttering, with some lengthy pauses during scenes with a lot of shaders.  It gets better, but it's never great. Also didn't detect my 360 pad.  It's playable, but YMMV based on your tolerance for iffy framerates.
title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series

notes:
Every time a new shader is used, there's a significant pause (up to 3 seconds). For the most part, this is manageable, but it can interfere with the QTE events. My Steam Controller is also not detected. It's playable, but a bit more stressful than intended due to the shader issue.
Note: All settings on high, except DOF which is on medium.
title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series

notes: Played an hour of episode 2. Minor stuttering in the first couple of minutes, especially when the 'saving to disc' symbol appeared. No issues after the first couple of minutes.
title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series
